import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { isAuthenticated,signout } from '../auth' const AdminSidebar = () => { const { user } = isAuthenticated() return ( <>
Admin Dashboard
  • Dashboard
  • Users
  • Products
  • Categories
  • Orders
  • Name : {user.name}
  • Email : {user.email}
) } export default AdminSidebar
